Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near  Ashland/15th
ShortDescription: Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 15th, Paulina, 18th and Ashland, due to a street blockage near Ashland/15th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 15th, Paulina, 18th and Ashland, then resume their normal route, due to a street blockage near Ashland/15th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
